name: Chicken Stiry Fry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast cut into 1 inch cubes
1/2 yellow bell pepper cut into 1 inch pieces
1/2 red bell pepper cut into 1 inch

recipe.name: Combine Ingredients For Sauce
recipe.description: In a medium size bowl, whisk together corn starch and water. Add remaining ingredients (chicken broth, soy sauce, honey, and toasted sesame oil, red pepper flakes) and whisk to combine. Set aside.

recipe.name: Heat Skillet
recipe.description: Add one tablespoon of olive oil to a large skillet or wok and heat over medium high heat.

recipe.name: Cook Chicken
recipe.description: Add chicken (in batches if necessary) and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from skillet.

recipe.name: Ready for Vegetables
recipe.description: Reduce heat to medium and add remaining tablespoon of oil to the skillet.

recipe.name: Cook Vegetables
recipe.description: Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrots and cook, stirring occasionally, just until crisp tender. Add ginger and garlic and cook for an additional minute.

recipe.name: Add Chicken
recipe.description: Add chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.

recipe.name: Combine Sauce and Other Ingredients
recipe.description: Whisk stir fry sauce and pour over chicken and vegetables and stir gently to combine.

recipe.name: Boil Stir Fry
recipe.description: Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, and let boil for one minute.

recipe.name: Enjoy!
recipe.description: Serve with rice and/or chow mein if desired.
